Name: Steampunk Syndicate 2
About the game: Steampunk Syndicate 2 is tower defense with elements of collectible card game! This Game is made in awesome steampunk setting. We created a game world with eccentric characters, steampunk weapons, towers and highly detailed levels such as the Seaside Town, Flying Zeppelin, Temple of Time, Derelict Firing Field, Ruins of Spire and the Realm of the King. In Steampunk Syndicate 2 you will confront waves of relentless enemies. Build and fortify defensive towers: gatling gun, elemental fire thrower, bomber, tesla robot and generator. Game Features: ⚔️ More than 40 free levels to challenge your strategy. ⚔️ 5 upgradeable towers. ⚔️ Customizable steampunk robot. ⚔️ 2 upgradeable heroes. ⚔️ Fantastic eye-catching art design. Resistance and their giant steampunk machine The Defender have to protect their world again!
